title: Understanding Prader-Willi Syndrome
text: Prader-Willi Syndrome is a genetic disorder. Consider what part of our biology is responsible for genetic information.

title: Chromosomal Abnormalities
text: Genetic disorders often arise from abnormalities in chromosomes. Think about which chromosome might be involved in Prader-Willi Syndrome.

title: Identifying the Chromosome
text: Prader-Willi Syndrome is caused by an abnormality in which chromosome?

title: Effects of the Chromosomal Abnormality
text: Consider how a chromosomal abnormality might affect a person's metabolism, behavior, and development.

hintAnswer: genetic disorder affecting metabolism, behavior, and development
title: Understanding the Effects
text: What are the effects of the chromosomal abnormality in Prader-Willi Syndrome?
choices: genetic disorder affecting metabolism, behavior, and development
causes a developmental disorder of the brain
